'''1.1.4''' is an update for ''[[Pocket Edition]]'' and [[:Category:Bedrock_Edition|its derived editions]] which added new Marketplace content and fixes some bugs and crashes.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004127552|title=MCPE/WIN10/GEAR VR - 1.1.4}}</ref> While it was not the last update to 1.1, it was the last one before the beta builds of 1.2.0 started.

== Additions ==
'''[[Marketplace]]'''
* [[Battle & Beasts Skin Pack]].
* Pet Skin Pack by Imagiverse.
* Cyber Space Skin Pack by Irish.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed lag on Android devices when accessing [[resource pack]]s.
* Fixed some crashes occurring when launching the game.
* Fixed a crash when loading into a world while holding a [[compass]] or [[clock]].
